name: CSS-Basics
format:
<style>
/*
* {
    background: none !important;
}*/

    root, a, button, p, div {
        -webkit-user-select: none !important;
    }
    p font{
        display: flex;
        text-align:center;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-template p{
        background: none !important;
    }
    body {
        /*background-image: url("http://192.168.178.1:1880/ui/2023.jpg");*/
        /*background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(40, 42, 49, 1.0) 40%, rgba(47, 49, 56, 1.0) 80%) !important;*/
        /*background-size: cover !important;*/
        background: transparent !important;

        background: -webkit-linear-gradient(
            55deg,
            #009785 0%,
            #245aa5 100%
        ) !important;
        
        -webkit-touch-callout: none !important;
        color: #ffffff !important;
        padding-top:5px !important;
    }
    
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {

    }

    
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(250,250,250,0.3) !important;
        border:none !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
/*        box-shadow: 0 3px 6px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19) !important;
*/    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel>div>md-card {
        background: none !important;
    }
    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel button {
        /*background: none !important;*/
    } 
    md-toolbar {
        background: none !important;
    }
    md-sidenav {
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(40, 42, 49, 0.90) 20%, rgba(47, 49, 56, 0.90) 80%) !important;
    }
    md-card.nr-dashboard-button * {
        box-shadow: none !important;
    }
    /*md-card.nr-dashboard-template * {
        background: none !important;
    }*/
    
</style>

name: mybutt css
format:
<style>
    .mybutt{
        color: white;
        background: border-box !important;
        background-color: #0047AB !important;
        border-radius: 10px;
        display:flex;
        align-content: center;
        justify-content: center;
    }

    .mybutt:hover {
        color: black;
        background-color: #89CFF0 !important;
    }
    .myArrow {
        animation: blinker 1s linear infinite;
    }
    .myArrow:hover {
        animation: none;
    }
    @keyframes blinker {
        50% {
            opacity: 0;
        }
    }
</style>

name: modify message

<md-button class="vibrate filled touched smallfont rounded" style="background-color:#e67e22"
    ng-click="send({payload: 'Home'})">
    Back
</md-button>

name: button css
format:
<style>
  * {
      overflow: hidden;
  }
  .filled { 
      height: 70% !important;
      width: 90% !important;
      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 4% !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>
